mysql> select cnu2016_vtulsyan.orders.timestamp, sum(order_product.selling_cost * order_product.quantity) - sum(order_product.buying_cost * order_product.quantity)
    -> as 'daily_profit' FROM cnu2016_vtulsyan.orders join order_product
    ->                         on cnu2016_vtulsyan.orders.oid = order_product.order_id
    ->                         group by cnu2016_vtulsyan.orders.timestamp;
+---------------------+--------------+
| timestamp           | daily_profit |
